titles.title: Affirming the right of all renters to a safe, affordable, and decent home.
Affirming the right of all renters to a safe, affordable, and decent home.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Budget, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
